about_the_game:
Control dozens of guns with your mind!

Fully Dogomatic is a top-down auto-shooter where you play as a psychic corgi who controls guns with their mind. While you can carry many guns at once, you can’t change where you aim a gun after you pick it up, so choose wisely!

Face off against hoards of enemies: Hundreds of enemies will attack you at once from all directions. Choose where to place your guns carefully so you can deal damage in all directions at once.

Don't settle on just a couple guns: This isn't like other shooters where you change between a couple of guns. You start off with 10 gun slots and can upgrade yourself to carry even more!

Fully customizable weapons: There are tons of upgrades and attachments you can use to improve your guns. Get creative and design the deadliest weapons you can.

Simple and Intuitive: Fully Dogomatic is for the people. Whether you've been playing games for days or decades, anyone can quickly learn how to play. You can play with a keyboard, a mouse, or a gamepad.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: x64 architecture
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX11, DX12 capable

short_description: A roguelite auto-shooter where you create a ring of guns around you to mow down thousands of enemies! Upgrade your guns with insane mods and experiment with the endless possibilities. You may be an adorable dog, but that won't stop you from raining death upon your enemies!
